title: Mommy Comes Over
overview: Single mother and trauma surgeon Christiane juggles work, her teenage daughter Jette, and a secret affair with younger colleague Lars. When her meddling mother Luise arrives unannounced and moves in, chaos erupts. Luise takes over the household and Christianeâ€™s love life, while Jette secretly signs her mom up on a dating site to help her find love.
